summary:
Today, one of the company's new developers joined me for a home inspection to see how we work in the field. 
I showed him how I documented advice in one app, opened another to preview the protocol, opened a third to compile an invoice, opened a fourth to send in a tip. 
He was shocked at how complicated it was...
title: The Importance of Practical Experience

summary: By the time I reached the age of thirteen, I had horror fever.  I was renting every film I could get my hands on and had even begun buying VHS tapes.  I knew the classics (Halloween, Friday the 13th, Nightmare on Elm Street), and was familiar with some popular box art (Dead Alive, Ghost Story, Evil Dead 2) and was beginning to learn about more classic titles thanks to the now defunct site House of Horrors...
title: My First Viewing of Night of the Living Dead
